org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema
Class AeXmlValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeXmlValidator
public class AeXmlValidator
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for validating xml types (simple and complex) and elements

Method Detail

validateSimpleType

public java.lang.String validateSimpleType(java.lang.String aName,
                                           java.lang.Object aValue,
                                           javax.xml.namespace.QName aType)
                                    throws AeException
Validates the simple type by creating a wrapper document with the root element name matching the aName param and and setting the xsi:type attribute equal to the expected type.

Parameters:
aName - name of the simple type field, used to create a wrapper element for validation
aValue - value being validated
aType - name of the type, will become the value of xsi:type attribute
Returns:
error message or null if valid
Throws:
AeException

validateComplexType

public java.lang.String validateComplexType(org.w3c.dom.Document aValue,
                                            javax.xml.namespace.QName aType)
                                     throws AeException
Validates the complex type. The declared type passed in will be set on the document as its xsi:type value.

Parameters:
aValue - complex type being validated
aType - name of the type, will become the value of the document element's xsi:type
Returns:
error message or null if valid
Throws:
AeException

validateComplexType

public java.lang.String validateComplexType(org.w3c.dom.Element aValue,
                                            javax.xml.namespace.QName aType)
                                     throws AeException
Validates the complex type.

elementNameMatchesData

protected boolean elementNameMatchesData(javax.xml.namespace.QName aElementName,
                                         org.w3c.dom.Document aData)
Returns True if the element name matches the name is the data we are about to set, and False if it does not.

Parameters:
aElementName - XML qualified name of the element
aData - The document which represents the data to be set

declareSimpleType

protected org.w3c.dom.Document declareSimpleType(java.lang.String aVarName,
                                                 java.lang.String aData,
                                                 javax.xml.namespace.QName aTypeName)
                                          throws AeException
This method is used to create and prepare a DOM for validation. We will obtain the XML type information from the part and build the node tree based upon that. The data will be added to this node for validation. If any required information cannot be determined null will be returned for the document.

Parameters:
aVarName - The name of the var we are processing
aData - The data for the part we wish to validate
aTypeName - The XML qualified name of the simple type
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
AeException

protected AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef getDef()

Returns the def.
